sentence.Network_en: Yogi Berra: Baseball is ninety percent mental. The other half is physical.

sentence.Network_en: As a Yogi, I insist on separating practice from the daily life.
sentence.Network_cn: 做为一名瑜伽行者, 我是主张修行与日常生活分开进行的.

sentence.Network_en: The ordinary Yogi - ascetic has a fantastic ― a fantastically distracting, a fascinating ― life!

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Sanskrit yogī, from yoga (see yoga)

entry.def: A yogi is a person who has spent many years practising the philosophy of yoga, and is considered to have reached an advanced spiritual state.

means.word_mean: 1. one who practices yoga and has achieved a high level of spiritual insight
